subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: McDaniels became the most reviled and, it turns out, unexpectedly influential figure in Denver after stunning the N.F.L. by selecting Tim Tebow at least a full round ahead of popular expectation.
snippet: McDaniels became the most reviled and, it turns out, unexpectedly influential figure in Denver after stunning the N.F.L. by selecting Tim Tebow at least a full round ahead of popular expectation.
